nodes.plugins

类 NodePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
      • nodes.plugins.NodePlugin
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI, java.io.Serializable

    public class NodePlugin
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.network.interfaces.SensorNodeP2PImplI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI
    The class NodePlugin implements a plug-in for the sensor node component that provides the sensor node with the services to connect to the sensor network and to envoyer/traiter requests to the nodes in the network
    另请参阅:

      • installOn

        public void installOn(fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI owner)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI
        initialise the plug-in reference to its owner component and add to the component every specific information, ports, etc. required to run the plug-in.

        Contract

         pre     owner != null
 pre     getPluginURI() != null
 pre     !owner.isInstalled(getPluginURI())
 pre     getPreferredExecutionServiceURI() == null || owner.validExecutorServiceURI(getPreferredExecutionServiceURI())
 post    owner == getOwner()
 post    getPreferredExecutionServiceURI() == null || getPreferredExecutionServiceIndex() == ((AbstractComponent)owner).getExecutorServiceIndex(getPreferredExecutionServiceURI())
        指定者:
        installOn 在接口中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.PluginI
        覆盖:
        installOn 在类中 fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractPlugin
        参数:
        owner - component on which the plug-in must be installed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        另请参阅:
        PluginI.installOn(fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI)

      • executeAsync

        public void executeAsync(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI
        execute request asynchronously, a process which may require to continue the execution on adjacent nodes in the sensor network and spawn multiple parallel continuations when the request launch several request continuations on its neighbour nodes and so on.

        Contract

         pre     request != null && request.isAsynchronous()
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        指定者:
        executeAsync 在接口中 fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI
        参数:
        request - a request to be executed starting from the receiving node.
